activities: We collect various types of personal information from you.  For example, we may collect your name, address, email address, phone number, and credit card number with expiration date. When you submit an inquiry, we collect your name, email address and phone number to respond. We also may ask you for additional information, such as your age, interests, product preferences, or zip code. If you are an employee in the EU/EEA or Switzerland, we collect personal information for purposes of human resources administration and for communication.  We may respond to subpoenas, court orders, or legal process by disclosing personal data and other related information. We may collect and share personal information in order to investigate or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, violations of our Terms of Use, or as otherwise required by law.
